headline: Are Bullish DDOG Notes Revealing a Deeper Shift in Datadog’s AI Platform Strategy?
summary: In recent days, several research firms, led by Stifel and TD Cowen, have issued upbeat reports on Datadog ahead of its Q4 2025 earnings, highlighting expectations for a stronger-than-usual quarterly performance and accelerating core business trends. Analysts are also focusing on Datadog’s evolution into an AI-centric operations platform, including its Bits AI agents and OpenAI-related security work, which they see as increasingly central to enterprise cloud and AI infrastructure. Against...
